Starstorm:

"Am I arrived...??? it's soon" said the femme while she saw the ship 
fall, and she flew around until she saw the Triped insignia "By all 
Predss" hissed the femme "This is the wrong place of all..."

She took off again and moved out there


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
<wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: Hold them as long as you can. Yggdrasil out.
> 
> He saw on his internal detectors that some new pods were incoming
> towards Earth. After picking up the landing coordinates, he called
> Blackfang.
> 
> Yggdrasil: Blackfang, there are a few pods incoming. This is the
> place. Head out and investigate. Base out.
> 
> Blackfang received the message.
> 
> Blackfang: Again? Oh scrap... Well, I gotta go.
> 
> He ran wildly to the pods' location and intended to be the first 
one
> there.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Devilcat's reply is terse and rushed.  "We're holding our own.  
The 
> > two new bots will go with whoever wins the battle - thus, I have 
no 
> > intention of losing.  Now if you'll excuse me, I have a Tripred 
to 
> > scrap."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Blackfang went on top of a cliff, far from the battle. He 
hated the
> > > idea to leave the newcomers in the hands of either the Rogues, 
whom 
> > he
> > > considered brutal, or the Tripredacus, whom he thought were 
fairplay
> > > but dangerous.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: Commander Yggdrasil, Rodimus, Nightlight and I are
> > > retreating due to some kind of affliction that Nightlight 
caught, 
> > from
> > > what little I saw.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: I read you Blackfang. Yggdrasil out.
> > > 
> > > He took his temples in his huge left hand and thought.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: Devilcat, this is Yggdrasil. How is the battle 
going for
> > > your troup? Give me a full sitrep, please.
